includeSubAccounts.description: Indicates whether data from sub accounts should also be streamed.

source.description: The source of data to stream.

destination.description: The destination is the component name that, along with the region, construct the topic name that the data should be streamed to.

srcRegion.description: The region that the data should be streamed from.

dstRegion.description: The region that the data should be streamed to.

fields.description: The subset of fields from the source data that should be streamed.

labels.description: The labels applied to the streamed data.

filter.description: A source specific configuration to filter source data.
